reviewText: This was a movie that the plot was not as expected
The movie has absolutely no plot worth watching and paying $3.99 for. The photography is poor, and the acting is even worse. How this  movie got a score of 3 stars, I just don't know.?

unbelievably cheap production. I would have expected much more from
Amazon.  Do not waste money or time on this piece.
Good story line and moved quickly.  Plenty of nudity to make it believable.
To dramatic acting, not enough nudity.

About a women that didn't appreciate what she had until it was too late, and then doing whatever it took to get it back and not caring what damage she did to get what she had back.  She became so jealous that she just about destroyed what she wanted, and lost everything.

Just in a word - primitive! A completely predictable story, with really mediocre acting.

Amazon really needs to get some great Spanish movies - from Almodovar, etc.
